metadata.title: CVE-2022-38861 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
The MPlayer Project mplayer SVN-r38374-13.0.1 is vulnerable to memory corruption via function free_mp_image() of libmpcodecs/mp_image.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38861` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mencoder - 2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu1.1
mplayer - 2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu1.1
mplayer-gui - 2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mplayer package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu1.1').
